chapters.title: Prologue: Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info: Adelorna Bastine, p. 56—Short, slim, Saldaean Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She is the Captain-General of the Green Ajah, the Ajah's leader. She was once birched by Elaida. She chose Rina for the Hall without a nominations process, which goes against Green custom. She has three Warders. She is slim, and of a height with Egwene.
